original: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhūt:

original: atha te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan:
analyzed: atha te deva putrāḥ āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocan

original: bodhir api subhūte svapnopamā māyopamā vadasi. tat kiṃ nirvāṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadasi?
analyzed: bodhiḥ api subhūte svapna upamā māyā upamā vadasi tat kim nirvāṇam api svapna upamam māyā upamam vadasi
subhūtiḥ āha

original: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadāmi,
analyzed: nirvāṇam api aham deva putrāḥ svapna upamam māyā upamam vadāmi

original: sacet tato nirvāṇād anyaḥ kaścid dharmo viśiṣṭataro bhavet,
analyzed: saced tatas nirvāṇāt anyaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ viśiṣṭataraḥ bhavet

original: tam apy ahaṃ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tam api aham svapna upamam māyā upamam vadeyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi devaputrāḥ svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi deva putrāḥ svapnaḥ ca māyā ca nirvāṇam ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo 'nekāni ca bodhisattvasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim evam āhuḥ:
analyzed: āyuṣmān ca mahākāśyapaḥ nekāni ca bodhisattva sahasrāṇi āyuṣmantam subhūtim evam āhuḥ

original: ke 'syā bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃpraṇītāyāḥ

original: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān mahāśrāvakān tāñ ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān etad avocat:

original: avaivartikā āyuṣmanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā
analyzed: avaivartikāḥ āyuṣmantaḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ asyāḥ evaṃgambhīrāyāḥ evam atarkāyāḥ evam atarkāvacarāyāḥ

original: evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā

original: dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāś

original: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇāsyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā

original: evamatarkāvacarāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśyāyā evaṃduravabodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā
analyzed: evam a tarka avacarāyāḥ evam sūkṣmāyāḥ evam nipuṇāyāḥ evam durdṛśyāyāḥ evam duravabodhāyāḥ evam śāntāyāḥ
evaṃpraṇītāyāḥ

original: evamalamāryāyā evaṃpaṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā na kecit pratyeṣitāro bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam alam āryāyāḥ evaṃpaṇḍita vijña vedanīyāyāḥ na kecid pratyeṣitāraḥ bhaviṣyanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate. yathaivātra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate tathaivātra na kaścit sattvaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi atra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate yathā eva atra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate tathā eva atra na kaścid sattvaḥ

original: atha āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:

original: na tv āyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa trīṇi yānāni vyavasthāpyante. śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ,
analyzed: na tu āyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyām vistareṇa trīṇi yānāni vyavasthāpyante śrāvaka yānam pratyekabuddha yānam samyaksaṃbuddha yānam

analyzed: yaiḥ ca kuśala mūlaiḥ ākāṅkṣiṣyanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartum gurukartum mānayitum pūjayitum tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśala mūlāni samṛtsyanti

original: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti. sa na kadācid ācchetsyate,
analyzed: yam ca teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām antikāt dharmam śroṣyanti sa na kadācid ācchetsyate

original: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti. sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena. asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākārajña tām anuprāpsyanti sadā samāhitāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti a vikṣiptāḥ ca samāhita yogena a saṅga pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: anācchedyapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti. samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: an ācchedya pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti samāhita pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti
yukta pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti
śliṣṭa pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti
arthavat pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: sarva loka abhyudgata viśiṣṭa pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ anupalambha yogena

original: atyantaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś
analyzed: atyanta śūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigrahaḥ upadiśyate prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat daśamaḥ citta utpādaḥ bodhisattva mārgaḥ

original: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
analyzed: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abhijñā vikrīḍitāni upadiśyante evam kila bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti. evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ upapādukāḥ bhaviṣyanti evam abhijñāsu a parihāṇa dharmāṇaḥ bhavanti
buddhakṣetrāt buddhakṣetram saṃkramiṣyanti

original: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛtsyanti,
analyzed: yaiḥ ca kuśala mūlaiḥ ākāṅkṣiṣyanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartum gurukartum mānayitum pūjayitum tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśala mūlāni samṛtsyanti

original: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
analyzed: yam ca teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām antikāt dharmam śroṣyanti
sa na kadācid ācchetsyate

original: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti. sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena. asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākārajña tām anuprāpsyanti sadā samāhitāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti a vikṣiptāḥ ca samāhita yogena a saṅga pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: anārthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti. samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: anārthavat pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti samāhita pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti
yukta pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti
śliṣṭa pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti
arthavat pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti

original: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: sarva loka abhyudgata viśiṣṭa pratibhānāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ anupalambha yogena
sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha

original: upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
analyzed: upadiśyate prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat daśamaḥ citta utpādaḥ bodhisattva mārgaḥ ca upadiśyate

original: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:
analyzed: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasya etat abhūt

original: asyāḥ sarvadharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ yan nv ahaṃ puṣyāṇy abhinirmāya
analyzed: asyāḥ sarva dharma vṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ yat nu aham puṣyāṇi abhinirmāya

original: buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca mahāsattvān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthaviram

original: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avakireyam abhyavakireyam abhiprākireyaṃ,
analyzed: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā karmaṇe avakireyam abhyavakireyam abhiprākireyam

original: yāvantaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau cāturmahārājikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā

original: devā brahmapurohitā devā brāhmaparṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
analyzed: devāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ devāḥ brāhmaparṣadyāḥ devāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ devāḥ ābhāḥ devāḥ parīttābhā

original: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatpharā devā
analyzed: devāḥ śubha kṛtsnāḥ devāḥ bṛhāḥ devāḥ parītta bṛhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇa bṛhāḥ devāḥ bṛhat pharāḥ devāḥ

original: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devā sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣām etad abhūvan:

original: asyā dharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ. yaṃ nūnaṃ vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya

original: buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthavirañ cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
analyzed: buddham bhagavatam bodhisattvān ca bhikṣu saṃgham ca subhūti sthaviram ca asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

na imāni stambha niryātāni

aniryātāni bhadanta subhūte imāni puṣpāṇi

yat punar kauśika evam vadasi

original: aniryātānīmāni puṣpāṇi nemāni puṣpāṇi manoniryātāni na stambhaniryātāni,
analyzed: a niryātāni imāni puṣpāṇi na imāni puṣpāṇi manaḥ niryātāni na stambha niryātāni

original: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte,
analyzed: śakraḥ āha kim punar bhadanta subhūte
imāni eva puṣpāṇi a niryātāni

original: atha rūpam apy anirjātam evaṃ vedanāpy aniyātā saṃjñāpy aniryātā saṃskārā apy aniryātā vijñānam apy aniryātam.
analyzed: atha rūpam api a nirjātam evam vedanā api a niyātā saṃjñā api a niryātā saṃskārāḥ api a niryātāḥ vijñānam api a niryātam
subhūtiḥ āha
yat kauśika evam vadasi
na kauśika imāni eva puṣpāni a niryātāni iti

original: rūpam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam api kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat rūpam

original: vedanāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vedanā,
analyzed: vedanā api kauśika a niryātā yā ca a niryātā na sā vedanā

original: saṃjñāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃjñā,
analyzed: saṃjñā api kauśika a niryātā yā ca a niryātā na sā saṃjñā

original: saṃskārā api kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te saṃskārāḥ,
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ api kauśika a niryātāḥ ye ca a niryātāḥ na te saṃskārāḥ

original: vijñānam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānam.
analyzed: vijñānam api kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat vijñānam

original: cakṣuḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat cakṣuḥ

original: śrotraṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotraṃ,
analyzed: śrotram kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat śrotram

original: ghrāṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
analyzed: ghrāṇam kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat ghrāṇam

original: jihvā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jihvā,
analyzed: jihvā kauśika a niryātā yā ca a niryātā na sā jihvā

original: kāyaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa kāyaḥ,
analyzed: kāyaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa kāyaḥ

original: manaḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manaḥ.
analyzed: manaḥ kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat manaḥ

original: rūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat rūpam

original: śabdaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śabdaḥ,
analyzed: śabdaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa śabdaḥ

original: gandhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa gandhaḥ,
analyzed: gandhaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa gandhaḥ

original: rasaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa rasaḥ,
analyzed: rasaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa rasaḥ

original: sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ,
analyzed: sparśaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa sparśaḥ

original: dharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te dharmāḥ.
analyzed: dharmāḥ kauśika a niryātāḥ ye ca a niryātāḥ na te dharmāḥ

original: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñānam kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat cakṣuḥ vijñānam

original: śrotravijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
analyzed: śrotra vijñānam kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat śrotra vijñānam

original: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
analyzed: ghrāṇa vijñānam kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat ghrāṇa vijñānam

original: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
analyzed: jihvā vijñānam kauśika a niryātam yat ca a niryātam na tat jihvā vijñānam

original: manovijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manovijñānam.

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,

analyzed: ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ

analyzed: jihvā saṃsparśaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na sa jihvā saṃsparśaḥ

analyzed: kāya saṃsparśaḥ kauśika a niryātaḥ yaḥ ca a niryātaḥ na saḥ kāya saṃsparśaḥ

original: manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tnanaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,

original: tathā hi sa kṣāntipāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vīryapāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa kṣānti pāramitām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate vīrya pāramitāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa vīryapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa vīrya pāramitām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate dhyāna pāramitāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa dhyāna pāramitām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
analyzed: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate

original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyātma śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa bahirdhā śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ dhyā ātma bahirdhā śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate śūnyatā śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa śūnyatā śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate mahāśūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa mahā śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate paramārtha śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa paramārtha śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate saṃskṛta śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa saṃskṛta śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate asaṃskṛta śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ saṃskṛta śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate atyanta śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ u tyanta śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate an avara agra śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ
tathā hi saḥ navara agra śūnya tām na samanupaśyati

original: yatra śikṣate. anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yatra śikṣate anavakāra śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ navakāra śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate prakṛti śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa prakṛti śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate sarva dharma śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa sarva dharma śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi sa sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate anupalambha śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ nupalambha śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate abhāva śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ bhāva śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate svabhāva śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa svabhāva śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ bhāva svabhāva śūnyatām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate

original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ caturṣu smṛti upasthāneṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa catvāri smṛti upasthānāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa samyakprahāṇāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa samyakprahāṇāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa ṛddhipādāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pañcendriyeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ ṛddhipādām na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate pañca indriyeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa indriyāṇi na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pañcaṣu baleṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ indriyāṇi na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate pañcaṣu baleṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa balāṇi na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa balāṇi na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa bodhyaṅgāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. āryāṣṭāṅge marge na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa bodhyaṅgāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate ārya aṣṭāṅge marge na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ ārya aṣṭāṅgam mārgam na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate

original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caturṣv āryasatyeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ caturṣu ārya satyeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa āryasatyāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu dhyāneṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ ārya satyāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate caturṣu dhyāneṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa dhyānāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa dhyānāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate caturṣu apramāṇeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa apramāṇāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. catasṛṣu ārūpyasamāpattiṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa apramāṇāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate catasṛṣu ārūpya samāpattiṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa ārūpyasamāpattin na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. aṣṭāṣu vimokṣeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ ārūpya samāpattin na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate aṣṭāṣu vimokṣeṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'ṣṭau vimokṣān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. (ŚsP_II-3_73)
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ ṣṭau vimokṣān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate

original: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukheṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ nupūrva vihāra samāpattīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukheṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pañcasv abhijñāsu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate pañcasu abhijñāsu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi so 'bhijñā na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sarvasamādhiṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ u bhijñāḥ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate sarva samādhiṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa sarvasamādhīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. dhāraṇīmukheṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi sa sarva samādhīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate dhāraṇī mukheṣu na śikṣate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa dhāraṇīmukhāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. daśatathāgatabaleṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: tathā hi sa daśatathāgatabalāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: tathā hi sa vaiśāradyāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: tathā hi sa catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. mahāmaitryā na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: tathā hi so 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.

original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ srotaāpattiphale na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaparigrahayogena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
analyzed: evam khalu āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharma parigraha yogena sarva ākārajña tāyām niryāsyati

original: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
analyzed: āha evam śikṣamāṇaḥ āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā sarva ākārajña tāyām niryāsyati
subhūtiḥ āha

original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
analyzed: evam śikṣamāṇaḥ āyuṣman chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā sarva ākāra jña tāyām niryāsyati
sarva dharmā parigraha yogena

original: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ parigrahāyāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
analyzed: āha evam śikṣamāṇaḥ āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharmāṇām parigrahāya antardhānāya śikṣitvā katham sarva ākārajña tāyām niryāsyati
subhūtiḥ āha

original: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati,
analyzed: iha āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na rūpasya utpādam paśyati

original: nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati na saṃkleśaṃ paśyati na vyavadānaṃ paśyati nācayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ paśyati na hāniṃ paśyati na vṛddhiṃ  #

analyzed: na saṃkleśam paśyati na vyavadānam paśyati na ācayam paśyati na apacayam paśyati na hānim

analyzed: a vṛddhaye prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitvā sarva ākārajña tāyām niryāsyati a śikṣā a niryāna yogena

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ chāradvatīputram etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam chāradvatī putram etat avocat

original: prajñāpāramitā bhadanta śāradvatīputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kuto gaveṣitavyā?
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā bhadanta śāradvatīputra bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām kutas gaveṣitavyā
śāradvatīputraḥ āha

original: prajñāpāramitā devānām indra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ subhūtiparivartā gaveṣitavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā devānām indra bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām subhūti parivartā gaveṣitavyā

original: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocat

original: tavaiṣa bhadanta subhūte 'nubhāvaṃs tavaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yad ārya (ŚsP_II-3_125)
analyzed: tava eṣa bhadanta subhūte nubhāvan tava etat adhiṣṭhānam yat ārya
śāradvatīputraḥ evam āha
subhūti parivartā bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyā
subhūtiḥ āha

original: na mamaiṣa kauśikānuhāvo na mamaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
analyzed: na mama eṣa kauśika anuhāvaḥ na mama etat adhiṣṭhānam

original: śakra aha: tat kasyaiṣa bhadanta subhūte 'nubhāvaḥ kasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
analyzed: śakra aha tat kasya eṣa bhadanta subhūte nubhāvaḥ kasya etat adhiṣṭhānam
subhūtiḥ āha
tathāgatasya eṣa kauśika anubhāvaḥ tathāgatasya etat adhiṣṭhānam

satata samitam ca asya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā

original: mānsa kauśika satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ mānayitavyaṃ manyate,
analyzed: mānsa kauśika satkartavyam gurukartavyam mānayitavyam manyate

original: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ mānayitavyaṃ pūjayitavyaṃ manyet.
analyzed: bodhisattvam mahāsattvam satkartavyam gurukartavyam mānayitavyam pūjayitavyam manyet

original: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayītavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cāsya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa lokena satkartavyaḥ gurukartavyaḥ mānayitavyaḥ pūjayītavyaḥ satata samitam ca asya rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ
yat ca kauśika ayam

original: lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇe bhavec chrāvakapratyekabuddhais tad yathā pi nāma naḍavanaṃ
analyzed: lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇe bhavet śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ tat yathā nāma naḍavanam

original: vā ikṣvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śāravanaṃ vā śārivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā tan kaścid eva
analyzed: vai ikṣvanam vā śara vanam vā śāra vanam vā śāri vanam vā tila vanam vā tat kaścid eva

original: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yavajjīvaṃ satkuryāt mānayet pūjayet sarvopakaraṇair yaś
analyzed: kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā yavajjīvam satkuryāt mānayet pūjayet sarva upakaraṇaiḥ yaḥ

original: caikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prathamacittotpādikaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaṃ
analyzed: ca ekam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam prathama citta utpādikam ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ avirahitam

original: satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayed ayam ayam eva tato bahutato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
analyzed: satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet ayam ayam eva tatas bahutatas bahutaram puṇyam
prasavet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na khalu punaḥ kauśika tāṃc chrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: na khalu punar kauśika tān śrāvaka pratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ loke prajñāyate
na tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke prajñāyate

original: bodhisattvaṃ punaḥ kauśika mahāsattvam āgamya sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddho loke prajñāyate,
analyzed: bodhisattvam punar kauśika mahāsattvam āgamya sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaḥ loke prajñāyate

original: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyate. tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
analyzed: tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke prajñāyate tasmāt tarhi kauśika sa deva mānuṣa asureṇa

original: lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ
analyzed: lokena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyaḥ gurukartavyaḥ mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ
satata samitam ca asyāḥ rakṣā āvaraṇa guptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā
śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parivartaḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ
